problem_text_cn: △ABC是⊙O的内接三角形,AB=30,AC=24,BC边上的高AH=20,则⊙O的半径是()
problem_text_en: △ABC is the inscribed triangle of ⊙O, AB = N_0, AC = N_1, the height of BC side AH = N_2, then the radius of ⊙O is ()
raw_answer: 解:连接AO并延长,交⊙O于D,连接BD．在△ABD与△AHC中,≥ft\{\begin{matrix}∠ABD=∠AHC=90{^°}\\∠ADB=∠ACH\\\end{matrix}\right.\,∴△ABD∽△AHC,∴AD:AC=AB:AH,∴AD=\frac{AC×AB}{AH}=\frac{24×30}{20}=36,∴AO=OD=\frac{1}{2}AD=18,即⊙O的半径是18．故选:B．
raw_comment: 本题考查了圆周角定理,相似三角形的判定与性质,通过作辅助线,构造△ABD与△AHC相似是解题的关键．
